title: Hello I'm Yasin!
subTitle: Ai | Data Scientist | Full Stack Dev | Hacker | Geek

sections.title: About myself
sections.content: I am a simple programmer and I consider myself more of a geek than a programmer because computers are attractive to me and I spend most of my time behind the computer since I was a child and my loneliness and life have no meaning without computers and mathematics.

items.title: About my character
contents: I am critical and familiar with critical thinking
It is very important for me to learn and that the work has the best results

items.title: About favorites
contents: I am interested in Linux system and open source projects
I am very interested in playing chess and I have read the book Basics of Chess Theory by Mazelis
I am interested in reading and studying philosophy and mathematics

sections.title: Skills
sections.content: The general skills I know in the field of programming generally include these languages, of course, I have worked with languages ​​such as Go, C++, etc.

items.title: Javascript
items.content: I got to know the JavaScript language from the beginning of my career and used it in the front, and sometimes it was more useful for me to hunt bugs.

items.title: Python
items.content: Python was the first language I started programming with, and I use it to write security tools and website backends, and it is also very useful for data analysis...

items.title: C
items.content: The C programming language helped me to better understand the computer and its architecture and to understand the algorithms more easily...
